item.title: CarHunt
item.description: CarHunt is a software as a service for cross-portal comparison and acquisition of profitable used cars.

item.title: Air Support
item.description: Air Support explores the prediction of air quality in office environments and represents the practical part of my master’s thesis.

item.title: About
item.description: I’ve been working in IT since 2016, starting my bachelor’s in Business Informatics at Cooperative State University Baden Wuerttemberg, which I graduated in 2019 with a high enthusiasm for Software Engineering. I was taken by the idea of needing nothing but a notebook and code to create services and products that have financial or social significance or generate attention.

item.title: Legal Disclosure
item.description: Person Responsible: Alexander Eble Web- und Softwareentwickler Achstetter Strasse 36 88483 Burgrieden Germany mail@alex-eble.de

item.title: Tourist Typology
item.description: Tourist typology computes and visualizes a dynamic user clustering of tourists based on image ratings.

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Forwarding to Curriculum Vitae of Alexander Eble

item.title: FlexPowerHub
item.description: FlexPowerHub is a Software as a Service for energy trading which allows professional users to market their capacities individually and automatically.

item.title: Expo Generator
item.description: Expo Generator is a SaaS product that allows you to create apps in the browser without any technical knowledge.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You’re developing software with JavaScript and need reliable and competent support? Contact me readily and I’ll review your plans without any upfront engagement of yours.
